inputs.name: inputVolume
inputs.description: The input image for finding the largest region filled mask.

inputs.name: outputROIMaskVolume
inputs.description: The ROI automatically found from the input image.

inputs.name: outputVolume
inputs.description: The inputVolume with optional [maskOutput|cropOutput] to the region of the brain mask.

inputs.name: maskOutput
inputs.description: The inputVolume multiplied by the ROI mask.

inputs.name: cropOutput
inputs.description: The inputVolume cropped to the region of the ROI mask.

inputs.name: otsuPercentileThreshold
inputs.description: Parameter to the Otsu threshold algorithm.

inputs.name: thresholdCorrectionFactor
inputs.description: A factor to scale the Otsu algorithm's result threshold, in case clipping mangles the image.

inputs.name: closingSize
inputs.description: The Closing Size (in millimeters) for largest connected filled mask.  This value is divided by image spacing and rounded to the next largest voxel number.

inputs.name: ROIAutoDilateSize
inputs.description: This flag is only relavent when using ROIAUTO mode for initializing masks.  It defines the final dilation size to capture a bit of background outside the tissue region.  At setting of 10mm has been shown to help regularize a BSpline registration type so that there is some background constraints to match the edges of the head better.

inputs.name: outputVolumePixelType
inputs.description: The output image Pixel Type is the scalar datatype for representation of the Output Volume.

inputs.name: numberOfThreads
inputs.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.

description: This program is used to create a mask over the most prominant forground region in an image.  This is accomplished via a combination of otsu thresholding and a closing operation.  More documentation is available here: http://wiki.slicer.org/slicerWiki/index.php/Documentation/4.1/Modules/ForegroundMasking.
name: Foreground masking (BRAINS)
label: Foreground masking (BRAINS)
